Ngl, that scene where we seen Eugen had us in the first half. Deutschland is a loyal woman

Ahhh I probably should've included that in a note at the end in retrospect, but I guess it didn't occur to me at the time. I did see your comments about this on the other two versions though, so thanks for asking Takeakigaku-sensei about that :)
To clarify for future reference, when I said "many" I'm including the JP version and the first Eng version.

Alrighty, so to answer the question many of you have, I've reached out to the artist and ask them for clarification; this is their response. (This is my rough translation and interpretation, I'll place an imgur link to the short inquiry.)

"Greetings, Is your question referring to the latest doujin I drew? Within the doujin, there are a lot different Commanders working and living on port. While the ratio between Commanders and Ship-girls is quite imbalanced, there are a few lucky Commanders who are married to a Ship-girl. Eugen, who's married her Commander, is one of them. Eugen's Commander and Deutschland's Commander are two completely different people. As for names, the Commanders don't have any."

(Link for proof - http://imgur.com/a/BjOPKKi)
Apparently, this blonde isn't the only SKK in the port...
Who’s fucking eugen?

epic!

This is a much better translation than the previous upload. And they say a hentai can't have a good plot. Honestly, I don't even see this series as hentai, just a nice story with sex scenes in it. It had a nice bit of comedy, a nice bit of drama, a nice bit off deep feels, and a nice bit of personality. The fact that it features my absolute favorite ship-girl from Azur Lane is more of a perk at this point. 10/10. Gonna be sharing these digits everywhere. Also, I love how Deutschland dodged that NTR set up like Neo.
